message.content:
cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.CL 

Reasoning: 
- cs.RO (Robotics): The paper focuses on modeling curiosity in a mobile robot for exploration and monitoring tasks. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The paper proposes a real-time topic modeling technique to build a semantic perception model of the environment, which is a form of artificial intelligence. 
- cs.CV (Computer Vision): The paper uses the semantic perception model to plan a path through locations with high semantic information content, which involves computer vision techniques. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper mentions the life-long learning behavior of the proposed perception model, which is a form of machine learning. 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language): The paper uses topic modeling, which is a technique in natural language processing, to build the semantic perception model.
